=================
SilvaPoll CREDITS
=================

Meta::

  Valid for:  SilvaPoll 0.3+
  Authors:    Guido Wesdorp, Wim Boucquaert, Jasper Op De Coul
  Email:      guido@infrae.com, wim@infrae.com, jasper@infrae.com

SilvaPoll is developed by Infrae (http://www.infrae.com).

Thanks to:

  For the creation & initial development, the people at Wirtschaftsuniversitaet
  Wien (Vienna University of Economics and Business Administration) for their
  vision, patience, and exactitude. 
  
  Additional funding and polishing provided by the University of Bedfordshire.

Initial development:

  Guido Wesdorp <guido@infrae.com>
